tasks.instruction:
Enhance the café service training module at /workspace/shadcn-ui/ with two key improvements:

1. **Mobile Responsiveness:**
   - Make the entire app fully mobile-friendly and responsive
   - Optimize layouts for mobile screens (320px - 768px)
   - Ensure all components work well on touch devices
   - Responsive navigation tabs (consider stacking or scrolling on mobile)
   - Adjust font sizes for mobile readability
   - Optimize spacing and padding for smaller screens
   - Ensure buttons and interactive elements are touch-friendly (minimum 44px tap targets)
   - Test and optimize the assessment section for mobile use
   - Make indicator trackers responsive
   - Ensure emoji sizes and visual cues display well on mobile
   - Responsive card layouts (stack on mobile, grid on desktop)

2. **Color Scheme Update:**
   - Apply red-amber-green color scheme to service level sections:
     * **Bad Service**: Red color scheme (red backgrounds, borders, accents)
     * **Average Service**: Amber/Orange color scheme (amber backgrounds, borders, accents)
     * **Excellent Service**: Green color scheme (green backgrounds, borders, accents)
   - Update ServiceSection component to use these colors based on service level
   - Apply colors to:
     * Section cards and backgrounds
     * Borders and accents
     * Icons or indicators
     * Progress indicators when on each section
     * Any visual cues related to service levels
   - Maintain good contrast and readability
   - Keep the colors professional and not too bright

**Technical Requirements:**
- Use Tailwind CSS responsive breakpoints (sm:, md:, lg:, xl:)
- Test on mobile viewport sizes
- Ensure touch-friendly interactions
- Maintain all existing functionality
- Keep the modern aesthetic from previous updates
- Use Tailwind color utilities: red-500/600, amber-500/600, green-500/600 (or similar)

Use Shadcn-ui components, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS at /workspace/shadcn-ui/.
